reviews.title: Not bad...
reviews.comment: But neither has it blown my socks off. I do use it, however, when there are no sermons streaming on some of the other apps I use. Could do without the childrens bible look to the interface.
reviews.author: Shane Smither

reviews.comment: Horrible app!! Hated it. Never heard a word.
reviews.author: veronica saucedo
